poemContent: 10 packs of cashews,10 bags of beef,10 pints, 10 pork scratchings,10 more pints pal!down the gullet they go.10 women in the clubat 10 P.M sharp.��Idiot 1: Okay boys, ready to head down to the Taveneers,before we start the pub crawl, I have been starving myselfall week for this.��Idiot 2: Yes, yes mate, I agree, but first let's pick up a quick burger,maybe some fish and chips. Got me dole money saved up,may splash out on a quick Chinese, quite exotic, quite spicy,might add some salt, might risk it, then head down to the pub.��Idiot 3: Sounding good, sounding great,but first how about we play a game of five-a-side-footie.Get ourselves a bit worked up, may get in a fisticuff fight, if so,blame the ref, someone hold me back.Idiot 1: Okay,Idiot 3: Okay,Idiot 2: Alright,Idiot 1: Alright.Let's head off!
